summary: A defecting Soviet scientist is hit by a nuclear explosion near Yucca Flats and roams around as a beast.
cast: Douglas Mellor|Barbara Francis|Bing Stafford|Larry Aten|Linda Bielema|Ronald Francis|Alan Francis|Anthony Cardoza|Bob Labansat|Jim Oliphant|John Morrison|Eric Tomlin|Jim Miles|George Prince|Conrad Brooks|Graham Stafford|Tor Johnson|Coleman Francis|Marcia Knight|Joseph Luis Rubin|Mary Torres
keywords: flag on the moon|z movie|grindhouse film|murder of a nude woman|coyote
title: El monstruo de Yucca Flats
